Data Scientist

Enterprise Corp
Chicago, IL

Job Description

Enterprise Corp is seeking a Data Scientist to join our Analytics team. You will leverage machine learning and statistical analysis to drive business decisions.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop machine learning models for prediction and classification
  • Perform statistical analysis on large datasets
  • Build data pipelines using Python and Spark
  • Create visualizations and dashboards for stakeholders
  • Collaborate with product and engineering teams

Required Qualifications

  • Master's degree in Statistics, Computer Science, or related field
  • 3+ years of experience in data science or machine learning
  • Proficiency in Python, pandas, scikit-learn
  • Experience with SQL and data warehousing
  • Strong knowledge of statistics and probability

Preferred Qualifications

  • PhD in a quantitative field
  • Experience with deep learning (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP)
  • Publications in peer-reviewed journals
